澮字的基本解释

澮
kuài

澮
huì
均见“浍”。

澮字的汉语字典释义

[①]［kuài］
［《廣韻》古外切，去泰，見。］
“巜1”的今字。“浍1”的繁体字。
(1)田间排水道。
(2)指小沟。
[②]［huì］
［《廣韻》古外切，去泰，見。］
“浍2”的繁体字。
(1)水名。浍水。源出山西省翼城县东，西流经曲沃县、侯马市注入汾河。
(2)水名。浍河。源出河南省，流经安徽省入淮。
(3)古地名。在今山西省翼城县。
[③]［huá］
［《集韻》户八切，入黠，匣。］
“浍3”的繁体字。
水流汇聚。引申为大水冲击。

澮字的康熙字典解释

【巳集上】【水字部】　澮； 康熙笔画：17； 页码：页653第18
〔古文〕巜??【唐韻】【集韻】【韻會】【正韻】?古外切，音儈。水名。【說文】水出靃山，西南入汾。【水經注】澮水，出詳高山。　又涓澮，小流也。【郭璞·江賦】商搉涓澮。　又【爾雅·釋水】水注溝曰澮。【周禮·地官·遂人】千夫有澮。【疏】澮，廣二尋，深二仞。　又【廣韻】【集韻】?古邁切，音夬。義同。　又【集韻】烏外切，音薈。與濊同。深廣也。　又戸八切，音滑。兩水合也。

澮字的源字形

字源演变：

小篆楷体

澮字的起名意思

暂无。

drain
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［kuài］
["Guangyun" ancient outside cut, go to Thailand, see you. ]
The present word for "巜1". "浍1" in traditional characters.
(1) Field drains.
(2) Refers to Xiaogou.
[②]［huì］
["Guangyun" ancient outside cut, go to Thailand, see you. ]
"浍2" in traditional characters.
(1) Water name. Shushui. It originates from the east of Yicheng County in Shanxi Province and flows into the Fen River through Quwo County and Houma City in the west.
(2) Water name. Huihe. It originates from Henan Province and flows through Anhui Province into Huaihe River.
(3) Ancient place names. In today's Yicheng County, Shanxi Province.
[③] [huá]
["Jiyun" household eight cuts, enter the key, box. ]
"浍3" in traditional characters.
The currents converge. The extension is the water shock.
drain

[Siji 1] [Water Word Department] 　浍; Kangxi strokes: 17; Page number: page 653 18
[Ancient text] 巜?? [Tang Yun] [Jiyun] [Rhyme Meeting] [Zhengyun]? Ancient outer cut, sound. Water name. [Said the text] The water flows out of Qianshan, and the southwest enters Fen. 【Notes on Water Classics】Go through the water and show the mountains in detail.　It's trickling again, and it's a small stream. [Guo Pu·Jiang Fu] Discuss.　[Erya·Release] The water poured into the ditch and said Shu. 【Zhou Li·Diguan·Sui Ren】There are thousands of husbands. [Sparse] Shu, wide and second search, deep and second.　[Guangyun] [Jiyun]? Ancient Maiqie, Yinzheng. The same meaning.　[Jiyun] Wuwai cut, Yinhui. Same as sip. Shenguang also.　Eight cuts again, the sound is slippery. Dihydrate also.
